## Goal
Implement a ranking algorithm for marketplace bounties.

## Requirements
- Use provided mock data
- Assign a score per bounty
- Sort by score
- Explain scoring logic in code comments

## Acceptance Criteria
- List is ordered by score
- Scores are visible
